wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Harris (1913–1980) was a British Post-Impressionist artist. He has been described as “a 20th-century English painter of first importance." (Art Review, October 2002, Volume LIII) Since his death in 1980, Harris’ surviving body of work has been the subject of increasing academic and commercial interest. The first reproductions of his work appeared in an article in Art Review in 2002.

response: * Stephen Harris, musician, also known as Kid Chaos and Haggis
* Stephen Harris (umpire) (born 1980), South African cricket umpire
